metadata.synopsis: The Malacicis, a hard-working Italian family recently immigrated from Florence, open a fancy restaurant in the Bronx, N.Y., drawing the ire of another clan. Mike (Joseph Bologna) and Sadie Capomezzo (Lainie Kazan), equally hard-working Sicilian caterers from the area, find they cannot stand Piero (Paul Sorvino) and Maria Malacici (Barbara Carrera). But things get complicated when the Malacicis' daughter, Gina (Angelina Jolie), and the Capomezzos' son, Rosario (Nathaniel Marston), fall in love.
